data.title: EMC Documentum D2
data.text:
EMC Documentum D2: Powerful configuration services with a spreadsheet-style approach. Documentum D2 delivers rapid time to value, a modern and intuitive client interface, and simplified application implementation.

Enables the New User

Documentum D2â€™s intuitive checkbox configuration capabilities provide the flexibility and functionality needed to modernize the user experience and drive adoption.

Enhances Documentum

Use the fastest and most powerful platform available for content-centric application creation and deployment.

Delivers Rapid Value

Eliminate the need for custom coding and enable the creation of application-specific templates that can be deployed across the enterprise.
